A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A fantastic sequel to one of the most tense episodes of the saga. While The force Awakens set the way and gave the fans what they wanted\, The last Jedi set a new tone and explores even more Geroge's Lucas creation. It does not show more of the same\, its all new. A boldly move\, a fresh\, funny and fantastic adventure. Star Wars from beginig to end.
